      double timeDelta
      The time between each action selection
      boolean useCorrectModel
      Specifies whether the correct Cart Pole physical model should be used or the classic, but incorrect, Barto Sutton and Anderson model [1].

    • Field Detail

      • halfTrackLength

        public double halfTrackLength

      • angleRange

        public double angleRange
        The maximum radius the pole can fall. Note, physics get weird and non-realisitc at pi/2; task should terminate before then.

      • gravity

        public double gravity
        the force of gravity; should be *positive* for the correct mechanics.

      • cartMass

        public double cartMass
        The mass of the cart.

      • poleMass

        public double poleMass
        The mass of the pole.

      • halfPoleLength

        public double halfPoleLength
        The half length of the pole.

      • cartFriction

        public double cartFriction
        The friction between the cart and ground

      • poleFriction

        public double poleFriction
        The friction between the pole and the joint on the cart.

      • movementForceMag

        public double movementForceMag
        The force magnatude that can be exterted in either direction on the cart

      • timeDelta

        public double timeDelta
        The time between each action selection

      • maxCartSpeed

        public double maxCartSpeed
        The maximum speed of the cart. A good place to set it to is somewhere around the max expected if the cart was pushed from one side of the track to the other. The default is 6.81 (which is an upperbound of that with default parameters)

      • maxAngleSpeed

        public double maxAngleSpeed
        The maximum speed of the change in angle. The default sets it to the speed that would result in 12 degress for a sinlge time step of 0.02 (which is about 10.47 radians/second), since 12 degrees is the default termination range.

      • isFiniteTrack

        public boolean isFiniteTrack
        Whether the track is finite (true) or infinite (false). When the track is infinite, the position of the cart always remains the same.

      • useCorrectModel

        public boolean useCorrectModel
        Specifies whether the correct Cart Pole physical model should be used or the classic, but incorrect, Barto Sutton and Anderson model [1].
